title: Interpretation of shrimp in a dream: seeing eating shrimp in a dream

preview.html: A dream about shrimp, crab, and shrimp, whether cooked, eating, buying the largest, for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Abdullah. Sadiq and others: Shrimp in a dream is one of the dreams that we see because of our constant longing to eat shrimp in public life, which is the most delicious and nutritious seafood, which has many important benefits that it provides to the body in public life. This is why we provide you with detailed interpretations of seeing shrimp in a dream in the following article. Interpretation of shrimp in a dream. Whoever sees that he is eating shrimp, will have simple and abundant food, and if the dreamer sees that he is eating shrimp in a dream, and it tastes delicious, then this vision indicates good news about an appointment. The next marriage of its owner. This dream is whether it is a young man or a girl. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing shrimps in a dream indicates that this person will fulfill many wishes in the next stage of his life. But if the shrimp in the dream was a dead shrimp, this indicates that the person who had this vision will be exposed to some crises. In his life. Many dream interpreters say that seeing shrimp in a dream generally indicates kindness and plenty of nourishment for the dreamer. Interpretation of prawns in one dream. If an unmarried girl sees shrimp in a dream, this indicates a good omen, indicating abundance of sustenance and money, and it can It also indicates the presence of happiness for that girl with her family and in her social environment. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating shrimp in a dream, this indicates good luck, the achievement of goals and aspirations, as well as evidence of excellence and success in achieving desires. It also indicates that eating shrimp is for the unmarried girl To the many joys, occasions and happy events that a girl experiences. Interpretation of shrimp in a pregnant woman’s dream. Many dream interpreters say that seeing shrimp in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she will give birth to a male child, and God Almighty knows what is in the wombs. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating shrimp in a dream and it tastes If the shrimp are good, this indicates the ease of giving birth to that woman, and perhaps this is evidence that the newborn will be healthy. Interpretation of shrimp in a man’s dream: Seeing shrimp in a man’s dream indicates that he will find a suitable job opportunity and is also evidence that the man will achieve his goals in the near future, God willing. If a person sees that he is catching shrimp in his dream, and the water in which the shrimp is found is fresh water, this indicates the fulfillment of desires and ambitions, and vice versa, if this water is cloudy, this indicates the presence of some obstacles. To achieve desires and goals. If a man eats shrimp in a dream and it tastes delicious, this indicates polygamy for that man in his life, even if the number of shrimp is more than four. It indicates a lot of money and a lot of sustenance in life. Interpretation of shrimp in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees shrimp in her dream, this vision indicates the presence of many haters and haters.

If a married woman sees shrimp in her dream, this vision indicates the presence of many haters and haters.

title: Interpretation of seeing someone crying in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing someone crying in a dream: Crying differs in its meaning in reality. We find someone crying from joy, someone crying from pain, someone crying in prayer as a form of supplication to God Almighty, and so on. Seeing someone crying in a dream has many symbols and connotations that vary depending on his social and psychological status and the reasons for his crying, and today we learn about the correct interpretation with the leading imams of dream interpretation. What is the interpretation of seeing someone crying in a dream? When one sees someone crying in a dream, one inevitably feels upset. From this dream and wants to know what it refers to and whether good or bad is expected from him, and this we will discuss in the following points in different details. If he cries silently and the tears only flow down his cheeks, then it is good that he will accept the request that the priest asks for something. But if he is strong And the people around him looked at him with pity. The next few days will face a lot of problems for the dreamer and it will be difficult to get rid of them, which will require the help of another person to help him. The fortuneteller’s attempt to calm the crying is an indication that he stands by those who need him, and is not stingy with feelings or money for those who seek refuge. To him for help and assistance. Seeing a young man crying in his prayer is evidence of his repentance for the sins he committed in his life, and his sadness for everything he did, with his full commitment after returning to her again. If a woman sees that her brother is crying, she is deeply attached to him and feels his pain and suffering because of The good upbringing that each of them received, and therefore if she is able to help him, she will not hesitate to provide it. Interpretation of a dream about a person crying has many meanings, the most important of which are repentance for sins, remorse for the actions committed, and feeling distressed and distressed by many burdens. Seeing crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said A person’s crying in his dream, if it is the crying of an innocent child, expresses the goodness of his heart, the purity of his bed, and the sensitivity that he possesses. But if it is a sad cry, then the dreamer suffers from severe anxiety that he carries alone and wants to hide from everyone. Seeing the mother screaming and crying in the Her dream is a sign of events that are disturbing her life and may affect her health or the health of one of her children. He said: Ripping clothes is evidence of denying God’s blessings upon him and his lack of gratitude to God Almighty for everything He has given him. What does it mean for a single woman to see someone crying in a dream? Seeing someone crying In a dream for an unmarried woman, a girl crying in a dream indicates that there is something that is worrying her and causing her to live a period of tension and confusion, and this feeling is due to her loss of confidence in her marriage due to the passage of years without her finding a suitable groom. But if she cried on her mother’s chest and she died, then she is in dire need of someone. He stands by her side at this time because she is exposed to many problems in the absence of a loyal friend. The girl’s calmness after a long period of crying indicates that there is good news on the way to her that will bring her out of the sorrows in which she was previously immersed. If the person she loves and desires sees her husband crying He has to propose to her soon, but his request is rejected again and again until her family is convinced that he is wrong

title: The meaning of dreaming about glasses in a dream

preview.html: Glasses are a tool that helps you see things clearly. They consist of two lenses. Certainly, there are many people who dream of glasses, but what does this dream mean and what does it symbolize? Fortunately, you will learn through this article about the meaning of dreaming of glasses in a dream in detail. Follow us. The meaning of dreaming of glasses in a dream sometimes. Our dreams are just a reflection of what we see in reality. Your dream of wearing glasses can be a sign of news or something like that and wearing them can be seen clearly and dreaming about them means that all the mystery will be removed soon, so your dream that you are wearing glasses in a dream is evidence that it is time to clarify everything.Interpretation Seeing yourself wearing glasses in a dream: The meaning of seeing yourself in a dream wearing glasses in a dream is that you are suffering from fear and anger because you discover that a friend has deceived you, but if you see this friend wearing glasses in the dream, this indicates good luck despite its instability. The mood of this friend. Interpretation of seeing glasses in a dream. If you see glasses in a dream, this means that you will do the impossible to achieve your dream regarding the problems you face in achieving your goal. Interpretation of broken glasses in a dream. If you dream that you are breaking glasses in a dream, this is a sign of the prestigious position that you will soon obtain. And you will achieve everything you want. You have to bear all the difficulties to achieve this goal in addition to resolving difficult conflicts. Wearing contact lenses in a dream If you wear contact lenses in a dream, this symbolizes challenging someone because he deceived you, and this is evidence of the weakness of your character and that you are a negative person, so You should not let others control your life. Interpretation of seeing broken glasses in a dream The meaning of seeing broken glasses in a dream can be evidence that you need others to stand by your side and that you are unable to understand what is happening around you. Seeing that you are wearing sunglasses in a dream If you Dreaming that you are wearing sunglasses in a dream, this is evidence that you are hiding something and do not want anyone to know what it is, and dark-colored glasses indicate that you are a pessimistic person who only sees the negative side. Wearing glasses, this is evidence that you are exaggerating your love for him. Interpretation of a vision A magnifying glass in a dream shows that you are trying to change your life because you feel so insecure that you are afraid to answer calls and respond to messages. Interpretation of losing glasses in a dream When you lose your glasses in a dream, this means that you are suffering from a certain problem, whether this problem is personal or practical, and this The problem can also make you run away from reality. Seeing blue glasses in a dream, as the blue color symbolizes obtaining money illegally, and this will cause you a lot of misfortunes. Seeing a man wearing glasses in a dream If a man sees himself wearing glasses in a dream, this means that There is a dispute between him and his wife. Interpretation of seeing glasses in a dream: If you see yourself in a dream wearing prescription glasses, this indicates the failure that surrounds you.

title: I know the interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake: It seems very disturbing. Snakes are among the most dangerous reptiles and cause a lot of fear and panic for all people. As for seeing them in dreams, do their connotations indicate good or bad? We will explain through our article full of information and all clear indicators so that the sleeper’s heart is at peace. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake. Many of the most important interpretation experts said that seeing a yellow snake in a dream indicates the presence of many people who harbor all hatred and evil for the dreamer and are planning great conspiracies so that he falls into it and does not do so. . can go out. He must deal with them with extreme caution during the coming periods. Many of the most important interpretation scholars have also confirmed that if the dreamer sees the yellow snake in his dream, this is a sign that he will suffer from many health crises that will greatly affect his psychology and health in the coming days. He also said that many Leading scholars of interpretation say that seeing a yellow snake in a dream indicates that he is surrounded by many people whom he trusts a lot and who are not trusted to keep secrets and are not able to be among his family. Close people and he must completely cut them off from his life. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a yellow snake in a dream is an annoying dream that indicates bad changes that will occur in the life of the dreamer and that will make him feel very sad and extremely anxious in the coming periods. As the great scholar confirmed Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer sees the presence of a yellow snake in his dream, this is a sign of the approach of an evil fraudster who wants him to fall into great problems and crises. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a yellow snake during the dreamer’s sleep indicates that he will be exposed to many major calamities that will fall on his head. In the coming periods. The Secrets website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world. Just write a website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a yellow snake for a single woman. Many prominent experts in the science of interpretation said that seeing a yellow snake in A dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she went through several stages of intense sadness that greatly affected her health and psychology during this period of her life. Many important jurists in interpretation have also confirmed that seeing a yellow snake in a fortuneteller’s dream indicates her trust in many people who He has not been trusted to keep many of her secrets, and this will cause her to have many major disagreements with the fortune teller. Her family in the next few days and she has to be very careful in the coming periods. Many leading scholars and interpreters also explained that if an unmarried woman sees the presence of a yellow snake in her bedroom during her dream, this means that a disreputable young man is close to her and will be the reason for her reputation being severely tarnished. You must stay away from it completely. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a married woman. Many of the most important interpretation scholars said that seeing a yellow snake killed in a dream for a married woman indicates that she has gotten rid of all the evil people who wanted to destroy her.

title: Interpretation of honey and honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing honey bees in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men. Buying black, white, and yellow honey, eating honey and eating it, and buying honey by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Al-Nabulsi and others. Honey in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that we see in many of our dreams and it has many important meanings, as honey is a thick liquid with a transparent yellow color and has a sweet taste made by bees and it is a cure for people, and seeing honey in a dream cannot be described by anyone. It is always praiseworthy or always worthy, so it depends on the dreamer's mental state and the method of obtaining this honey in the dream, whether it was bought or eaten, and so on. Everything related to him has a different interpretation, but in general, seeing only honey in a dream is a sign of the purity of his intentions, his correct behavior with others, and his respect for people. Interpretation of honey in a dream Witness: It indicates a solemn inheritance or company money. Honey in a dream is money from a lawful inheritance, Or money from plunder or a company. Honey for people of religion is the sweetness of religion, reciting the Qur’an and doing good deeds, and for people of this world earning spoils without effort. Honey is a little food for a person who is tired. If he sees the sky raining honey, this indicates the righteousness of religion. Perhaps the honey appears to be the honey of a woman or a man, as stated in the hadith: Until you taste his honey and it tastes for you, and perhaps honey will relieve worry, depression, and envy, and beware of the machinations of envy, because honey gathers flies, wasps, and ants. And honey is purified by fire, and relief after hardship, and a child after his months are over, and a wife after her waiting period, and money that is kept with zakat, and knowledge that saves you from heresies and suspicion. And guidance after that does not exist. It is deception. Pure honey is money. It was said: It is money that is hard work. Honey is a cure for diseases. It was said: Eating honey is a lover’s love and a kiss. And whoever eats bread with honey earns his living from the spoils. Interpretation of honey in a white dream by Ibn Sirin. If a person, male or female, sees white honey in his dream, this is an interpretation that his condition will improve and that God will bestow His bounty on him, or he is a man who loves the Qur’an and does not. He stops reading it every day. Perhaps honey here symbolizes the sweetness of recitation and remembrance, and God knows best. Interpretation of buying honey in a dream. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is buying a jar of honey, this does not bode well for what is to come, but it is an indication of approaching poverty and poor financial condition, which will be a reason for grief and sadness. Its severity, and God knows best. If a single person sees in a dream white honey on a plate in front of him on the table, this indicates that goodness is coming to him, and that he will enjoy a life of peace and without worry. Interpretation of a beehive in a dreamIf a person sees in his dream that he is standing in front of a beehive and sees honey in it. This is the interpretation that he will try in his work to obtain a high position in the company in which he works, or to raise himself financially. To a high level to become one of the owners of the upper classes. But this will be a difficult and arduous matter according to his patience and endurance, that is, he saw a cell, and this is evidence that he will face problems in reaching his goal, and God knows best. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a single woman is one of the dreams that includes many interpretations that differ depending on the condition of the car itself. In some cases this vision brings a lot of good news, and in other cases it brings shameful news. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a single woman by Ibn Sirinama Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a woman Single woman? Driving a car in a dream for a single woman brings a lot of goodness and livelihood for the woman, especially if the car is in good condition and gives the dreamer a feeling of happiness and joy. If an unmarried woman sees that she is driving a car at an insane speed, then this vision brings shameful news to the dreamer, as a result of her haste in taking many Of decisions that negatively affect her future. An unmarried woman who drives a luxury car with an upscale appearance and follows the brand near her is good news that indicates that the dreamer is related to a loved one and that her wedding date is approaching and that the next few days will bring her unprecedented happiness. The vision of a woman An unmarried woman driving a dilapidated car symbolizes that the dreamer will be exposed to a health crisis and the matter may develop and the dreamer may undergo surgery. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a car driving in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the dreams that indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition from one to another. To others in various aspects of life, whether related to an educational, professional, or social level. An unmarried woman driving a car calmly and wisely from a dream is one of the dreams that suggests that the woman is connected to a suitable person with whom she lives a happy life, and that the dreamer is characterized by wisdom and does not rush in making it. Decisions. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees that she is driving a car on an unfamiliar road and faces a feast of pitfalls and obstacles in it, this is an indication that the woman will face many problems and her relationship with an unreliable person, so the dreamer must be careful in her relationship and not be deceived by external appearances. An unmarried woman driving a car that she knows on the ground symbolizes that the dreamer is planning hard for her future and that very soon she will hear good news about her future, which is that she will get a job that she has always dreamed of. Learn more than 2000 interpretations of Ibn Sirin Ali on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. The most important Interpretations of a dream about driving a car for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about driving a luxury car for a single womanSenior dream interpreters agreed that seeing an unmarried girl driving a luxury car means that in the coming period she will witness many positive developments in the various affairs of her life and she may obtain an important job and power. A person who has an excellent financial level and you will be very happy with him. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car without a license: Seeing an unmarried woman driving a car without a license symbolizes that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems that will hinder her, and the dreamer must think carefully before making any fatal decision, while if a girl sees An unmarried woman drives her car without a license and is subjected to a violation

title: The most important evidence in interpreting a dream about seeing a naked man by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing Ibn Sirin naked: God forbids the private part of the human body to be revealed to others, except in certain cases, such as if it has a defect or is in the process of marriage, and this happens according to climate changes and the personal circumstances of the viewer. And his relationships with others. Perhaps seeing a man’s nakedness differs from a woman’s nakedness, and both of them symbolize indicators that may be similar in many ways and may also differ in other aspects, but what seeing a man’s nakedness in a dream symbolizes; Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man’s nakedness. This vision indicates many things that may In some cases, it appears to be a promising vision for those who see good days and new life experiences. It could be a sick condition or a reflection of a certain lifestyle that the viewer rejects, or a lot of thinking about forbidden topics or things whose time has not yet come. Some commentators saw that a man’s nudity in a dream symbolizes To the new turns that the dreamer goes through with great courage. The aura can indicate goodness, abundance of sustenance, and good news on the way to the dreamer’s life. A group of interpreters recognize the dreamer’s condition when he sees the private part in his dream. But if he is naked and ashamed of men, then this An indication that his relationship has been exposed and his secrets have been communicated to men openly, and that the balance of his cover with God has been exhausted. And if he sees himself without clothes, but the area of ​​his private parts is covered, then this is a sign of sincere repentance and return to God with an inspired spirit and may God’s mercy be upon him. And if the fortuneteller is corrupted Earth, the same vision indicates adherence to flogging falsehood and walking in the paths of innovators, and it is a vision worthy of the absolute. And if his nakedness appears while he is in the mosque, this indicates seeking forgiveness from God and returning to Him, and changing the situation from distraction and lies to guidance and truthfulness. Stripping a person of his clothes is against the desire The dreamer indicates things that are beyond his control and cannot be regained, such as loss of status, loss of a source of livelihood, and dismissal from work. The man’s nakedness also suggests poverty, destitution, and the inability to provide shelter. If he walks among people in the market and his nakedness is exposed and no one looks at him, this indicates Covering up and doing good deeds that he once did without being asked in return. The same vision symbolizes alleviating the distress of the afflicted, healing and enjoying health for the sick, prosperity and comfortable life for the needy, paying off debts, eliminating the accumulation of debtors, returning to the path of truth, and following the right approach. For sinners. And people who see a man’s nakedness in a dream is a sign of a scandal, so what is hidden from him is revealed, so his condition worsens and he loses his reputation. Seeing a righteous man indicates divine support and warning of the dangers of the path and the need to remain vigilant and defend the honor of his profession and religion. It also indicates a good state of his worship. And the abundance of worshiping Him. The nakedness of a man in reality symbolizes that part of the body that is not exposed except in absolute necessity, and by showing it to people without an excuse or reason, corruption in religion, loss of the virtuous work that a person performs, and a defect in his religiosity. But nakedness in a dream could be It has connotations and the opposite, it's not that bad

title: Find out the interpretation of a dream about stealing money from me by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing money from me can symbolize many life issues for the dreamer and his future, and this should be exactly according to the details of the vision.Interpretation of a dream about stealing money from meInterpretation of a dream about stealing money from me can symbolize wasting time and that the viewer should be more careful with his time than Before, so that he does not miss the opportunity to progress and progress in this life. The dream of stealing money from me can warn a person of someone who wants to steal his effort and fatigue, so that he treats those around him with more care and tries to highlight his work. The dream of stealing money from me may be evidence of the dreamer’s feeling of distress. As a result of some obstacles on the way to his success, and here he should not give in to this feeling, and pray a lot to God Almighty for relief and comfort, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of the dream of stealing money from me by Ibn Sirin. The dream of stealing money from me shows many things about Ibn Sirin. Stealing and catching a thief may remind the dreamer of his strength and that he must use it properly to be able to achieve goals and achieve what he desires. The near future. A person may dream that some of his money was stolen and some was left for him. Here, the dream of stealing money from me indicates the extent of the dreamer’s confusion in certain matters and that he is unable to make a decisive decision yet, and therefore he must think slowly and seek the help of God Almighty to guide him to what is best for him, and God I know. Interpretation of dreams about stealing money from me for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams about stealing money from me. The dreamer may herald the arrival of someone who will propose to her in the near future, and she must think about the matter and ask God to help her in what is best for her. Work hard and achieve. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of dreams about stealing money from a travel bag for single women: A girl may dream that someone is searching in her bag to steal money, and here the dream of stealing money indicates the need to warn the dreamer around her, as there may be someone trying to find out her secrets or a dream about stealing money from the bag It may symbolize the desire of one of those around the dreamer to change some of her principles, and therefore she must be careful and adhere to the upright principles as much as possible, and God knows best. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of stealing money from me: A dream of stealing money from me may indicate to a married woman the blessing of her life. For example, if he is struggling and working hard for the children and their future, he may soon reap the result of these troubles and feel stable and comfortable from the past. To dream of stealing money from me for a woman who suffers from a lack of attention from her husband may indicate the need for discussion to resolve this issue, otherwise the matter may come to a An irreversible dead end. A woman may dream that the one who steals her money in a dream is her friend who trusts her with her home and children. Here, the dream of theft symbolizes the need to be careful around those around him, as there may be someone who hates and plans to destroy her life, and of course the dreamer must pray to God. May God Almighty protect him from evil. Interpretation of a dream about stealing money from a travel bag for a married woman: A dream about stealing all the money from the dreamer’s bag and feeling extreme sadness can be interpreted as a warning of the coming period, which may witness some bad things.

title: Seeing a good man in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: We will explain in this article from your website gptafser.com/interpretations of seeing a just man in a dream for both single and married girls, men, pregnant women, and young men, as well as the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a just man in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a good man in an unmarried girl’s dream is a good vision. It is praiseworthy and promising. An unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is marrying a good and righteous man or the imam of a mosque in her dream. This dream indicates that this girl will marry a respectable, pious, religious, and sincere man, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If he sees an unmarried girl Married In her dream, he proposes to her, asks for her hand in marriage and then proposes to her. This vision is a good omen and symbolizes that she will marry a good man. Good and married life will be happy, calm and stable. Seeing an unmarried girl marrying a cleric or religious scholar in a dream. This dream symbolizes It indicates that she will enjoy a spacious and abundant living, and a lot of money in the coming period of her life. An unmarried girl seeing in a dream that she is kissing a good man. This vision indicates the imminence of her marriage to a good man. He is pious, has authority and a high position among people, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Seeing a righteous man in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a righteous man in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is marrying a cleric or religious scholar, and that this man has a long beard in the dream. This dream indicates that God Almighty will provide her with sums of money. A large amount of money in a short period of time, very soon, God Almighty willing. Seeing a married woman in a dream to a cleric or sheikh. This dream symbolizes the blessing, goodness, and livelihood that this wise woman will obtain, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. Some interpreters and scholars have stated that this The vision is a good, praiseworthy and promising vision. This indicates that she will live a happy, peaceful and stable married life, God willing. A married woman sees in a dream that she is kissing the hand of a righteous man or sheikh. This dream symbolizes the righteousness of this woman and God Almighty. Seeing a woman married to a man A righteous man or an old man in a dream. This dream is promising and indicates an improvement in the situation and material and financial level. It symbolizes the approach of broad and ample livelihood that you will obtain, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of seeing a righteous man in a dream about the man and its meaning. Seeing a righteous man in a dream symbolizes the knowledge that the dreamer provides. For people. And these people benefit from the knowledge that the dreamer provides, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a righteous man or a religious man in a dream can symbolize. The dreamer was able to get rid of all the problems and worries that he suffered during his life. Seeing a man in his dream is one of the clerics. Or the righteous people were giving him milk. This vision shows this person’s closeness to God Almighty and his righteousness as well. A man seeing in a dream that a righteous man is giving him wine. This vision symbolizes the high and prestigious position of this person among the people, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. They also followed: Seeing the Guardian A righteous person in a dream means seeing a righteous man
